column4: Any one know i there is some new features or changes to the backlight of laptop LCD from gutsy to hardy that may have caused it to break at my Asus laptop?
Sorry. jorggg, what do you mean.
My LCD backlight starts at minimum when i boot up. I cant change it before I have loged into gnome. The backlight also turns low when I play a movie in mplayer for instance.
So Im wondering if there have been any changes to backlight in hardy, cause it worked fine in gutsy
